title: Immoral
synopsis: A school doctor comes in possession of a sexual hypnotic spray that inhibits girls to succumb to sexual desires. One after another, high school girls fall prey to the school doctor's sex schemes turning them into sex slaves.
staff: [['Kawasaki, Kurou', ['Director']], ['Blue Gale', ['Original Creator']], ['Mori, Kokan', ['Planning']], ['Haganemaru', ['Original Character Design']]]
